articles.author: Tomás Mier
articles.title: Musicians Union Slams Trump’s Taylor Swift, Bruce Springsteen Tantrum - Rolling Stone
articles.description: American Federation Musicians defends Taylor Swift and Bruce Springsteen after Donald Trump’s attacks, backing their right to free expression.
articles.content: The American Federation of Musicians (AFM) is standing by its artists. On Friday, the union issued a statement defending Taylor Swift and Bruce Springsteen after Donald Trumpattacked the two stars on… [+1568 chars]
